https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/29O6qZuxhMP0aILJExK0rVh4WBa.jpg Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help. Christmas Next Door
